items.title: Unlock global AI inference scalability using new global cross-Region inference on Amazon Bedrock  with Anthropic’s Claude Sonnet 4.5
items.summary: Organizations are increasingly integrating generative AI capabilities into their applications to enhance customer experiences, streamline operations, and drive innovation. As generative AI workloads continue to grow in scale and importance, organizations face new challenges in maintaining consistent performance, reliability, and availability of their AI-powered applications. items.title: Machine Learnability as a Measure of Order in Aperiodic Sequences
Secure ingress connectivity to Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Gateway using interface VPC endpoints
items.summary: In this post, we demonstrate how to access AgentCore Gateway through a VPC interface endpoint from an Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) instance in a VPC. We also show how to configure your VPC endpoint policy to provide secure access to the AgentCore Gateway while maintaining the principle of least privilege access.

With GPT-5, Wrtn builds lifestyle AI for millions in Korea
items.summary: Wrtn scaled AI apps to 6.5M users in Korea with GPT-5, creating ‘Lifestyle AI’ that blends productivity, creativity, and learning—now expanding across East Asia.

items.title: Enhance agentic workflows with enterprise search using Kore.ai and Amazon Q Business
items.summary: In this post, we demonstrate how organizations can enhance their employee productivity by integrating Kore.ai’s AI for Work platform with Amazon Q Business. We show how to configure AI for Work as a data accessor for Amazon Q index for independent software vendors (ISVs), so employees can search enterprise knowledge and execute end-to-end agentic workflows involving search, reasoning, actions, and content generation.

items.title: OpenAI announces strategic collaboration with Japan’s Digital Agency
items.summary: OpenAI and Japan’s Digital Agency partner to advance generative AI in public services, support international AI governance, and promote safe, trustworthy AI adoption worldwide.

items.title: Samsung and SK join OpenAI’s Stargate initiative to advance global AI infrastructure
items.summary: Samsung and SK join OpenAI’s Stargate initiative to expand global AI infrastructure, scaling advanced memory chip production and building next-gen data centers in Korea.
